html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-02822018-03-12,  CH,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of ANA SERRANO of Toronto, Ontario, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum for Human Rights, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective June 1, 2018, in the place of Deena Granot, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of ANA SERRANO of Toronto, Ontario, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum for Human Rights, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective June 1, 2018, in the place of Deena Granot, whose term has expired.
